DESCRIPTION: This #yCompanion joins the battle. NL Any #yCompanion already in the fight will be replaced.
A swift and powerful creature, able to destroy all who oppose it. NL Upon arrival, Omen will attempt to #yProtect whoever summoned it.
Tell your #yCompanion to perform this #yMove at the end of your turn. NL Calling another #yMove will override this #yMove.
This is the weakest #yMove, which is #yCalled at the beginning of your turn.
A #yMove that focuses on dealing damage to a random enemy.
A #yMove focusing on granting you #yBlock, or weakening a random enemy.
The most powerful #yMove. NL Effects vary greatly between #yCompanions.
Given to #yCompanions, acting as both Strength and Dexterity for the companion. NL Does not transfer to new #yCompanions.
Targeted creatures take 50% more damage from #yCompanions. NL #yCompanions will prioritize targeted creatures with their #yMoves.
When played, return this card to your hand at the start of next turn.
Look at the top X cards on your discard pile. NL You may choose any of them to shuffle into your draw pile.
The next attack you play deals X more damage.
The next card you play that gives you #yBlock gives X more #yBlock.
When drawn, this card is immediately played, spending its energy cost.
Because #yCompanions are currently implemented as #yOrbs, and this card may give you cards that generate other non-#yCompanion #yOrbs, this will be unintended gameplay and may have bugs.
